description: You can find the most delicious Halal food throughout the curbs of Pittsburgh, all thanks to PGH Halal Truck. Their mouthwatering menu is made exclusively with the freshest and finest ingredients, and you can tell since every bite is absolutely bursting with flavor. A few of their items include Halal, gyros, chicken over rice, falafel, hot dog, fries. For all this and more, come out and try the tasty cuisine brought to you by PGH Halal Truck.
name: PGH Halal Truck
